title: 175 - Crate Craze Sweeps the Nation
description: Today’s episode features a full crew as today's ship is steered by our Canadian pal of the pal’s, Gump. The boys welcome you all back from the weekend as Boston Connor shares his experience golfing inside of the Indianapolis 500 track. There's no time wasted as the boys jump right into the Pod FOD, which is a folder compiled of all things from around the internet. Today’s FOD goes over the viral “Crate Craze”, Bill’s updates from the Call of Duty league championships, Zito hijacking a boat and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
